overview: A young man (Joe Kennedy) travels into the countryside. The phone message he repeatedly listens to on his phone is fragmented. He cycles to a crossroads where a bunch of flowers with a note attached is taped to a gatepost, then on to a scrapyard. He finds a car with audio cassettes hidden in the glove compartment. The owner of the yard calls out to him, his dog finally chasing the man away.
title: Magnetism
